metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8473 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The Issues API in Redmine before 2.6.8, 3.0.x before 3.0.6, and 3.1.xbefore 3.1.2 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitiveinformation in changeset messages by leveraging permission to read issueswith related changesets from other projects.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
